Properties.Name: g1
Properties.Description: Changes the colour theme of certain backgrounds

Properties.Name: g2
Properties.Description: Changes the background pattern of certain renders

Properties.Name: g3
Properties.Description: Choose whether or not to use driver avatars on certain renders. By selecting (Custom Avatars) the theme use driver name field: (Name), and the theme will search for images named after the name you have given to drivers. Example: (Name): Dark373 avatar image name: Dark373

Properties.Name: g4
Properties.Description: Change the size of the league logo

Properties.Name: g5
Properties.Description: Change the displayed name of the season. (Category) refers to the assignable league categories when right-clicking on a season.

Properties.Name: g6
Properties.Description: Change the amount of drivers displayed on renders. 10 = top 10 drivers will render.

Properties.Name: g7
Properties.Description: Determines which position continuous lists of drivers/teams starts from. Example: a value of 5 means certain renders will start from P5 instead of P1. For (Variable Information: Points) this value decides which position will render.

Properties.Name: g8
Properties.Description: Adjust the font size for certain renders.

Properties.Name: name1
Properties.Description: Changes which name fields are used. When (Full Name) is active, both (Name) & (RealName) will be used.

Properties.Name: name2
Properties.Description: Changes the order of name fields on renders. When ative, (Real Name) will become before (Name): Only works when (Full Name) is active.

Properties.Name: name3
Properties.Description: Sets all name fields to uppercase.

Properties.Name: cal1
Properties.Description: Spilts the total rounds in two columns. Toggle off for all rounds to render in a single column; Advised for very short seasons.

Properties.Name: cal3
Properties.Description: Changes the font size of the header text. Advised for languages with longer translations of (calendar).

Properties.Name: podname1
Properties.Description: Changes which name fields are used. When (Full Name) is active, both (Name) & (RealName) will be used.

Properties.Name: gri1
Properties.Description: Changes the width of the bar. Select a greater number, if driver names are too long to fit.

Properties.Name: gri2
Properties.Description: Renders pole time and the relavtive gap to the pole sitter.

Properties.Name: var1
Properties.Description: Chose what is displayed on the Variable Information render

Properties.Name: var2
Properties.Description: Fastest Lap text font size. Advised to change for longer translations.

Properties.Name: var3
Properties.Description: Winner text font size. Advised to change for longer translations.

Properties.Name: var4
Properties.Description: Podium text font size. Advised to change for longer translations.

Properties.Name: var5
Properties.Description: Points text font size. Advised to change for longer translations.

Properties.Name: var6
Properties.Description: Position text font size. Advised to change for longer translations.

Properties.Name: var7
Properties.Description: Determines which position info is taken from. Affects (Points) & (Position) only

Properties.Name: dot1
Properties.Description: Change the size of the driver name on the render.

Properties.Name: pol1
Properties.Description: Pole text font size. Advised to change for longer translations.

Properties.Name: sta14
Properties.Description: Renders golden font colour for champions.

Properties.Name: sta13
Properties.Description: Renders team colour behind the driver name.

Properties.Name: sta1
Properties.Description: Choose what data is shown in the first coolumn of standings renders

Properties.Name: sta2
Properties.Description: Data table contains info such as wins, podiums and more.

Properties.Name: sta3
Properties.Description: Default: Points Interval

Properties.Name: sta4
Properties.Description: Renders a second points gap column with points gap to leader.

Properties.Name: sta5
Properties.Description: Renders the set of podium positions.

Properties.Name: sta6
Properties.Description: Renders the amount of top 10 finishes

Properties.Name: sta7
Properties.Description: Renders the amount of fastest lap awards

Properties.Name: sta8
Properties.Description: Renders the amount of pole position awards

Properties.Name: sta9
Properties.Description: Renders the amount of driver of the day awards

Properties.Name: sta10
Properties.Description: Renders the amount of penalty points

Properties.Name: sta11
Properties.Description: Renders the amount of times a driver did not finish

Properties.Name: sta12
Properties.Description: Renders what data is displayed in the final column

Properties.Name: cha1
Properties.Description: Optional text with the intention of adding pevious titles. But its up to you.

Properties.Name: com1
Properties.Description: Based on the championship order of your season.

Properties.Name: com2
Properties.Description: Based on the championship order of your season.

Properties.Name: com3
Properties.Description: Based on the championship order of your season.
